imdb.plot outline: Chef Robert Oliver travels to Pacific resorts where he meets the local chefs. Together the explore the untold cuisines of the Pacific, discovering extraordinary heirloom ingredients and heritage recipes. They write ancient recipes directly onto the resort menus, creating new opportunities for the chefs, the tourists and the local supply communities.
imdb.title: Real Pasifik
plot: Chef Robert Oliver travels to Pacific resorts where he meets local chefs. Together they explore the untold cuisines of the Pacific, connecting local, traditional food producers with Pacific tourist economies.::jimmylittlewood

Chef Robert Oliver travels to Pacific resorts where he meets the local chefs. Together the explore the untold cuisines of the Pacific, discovering extraordinary heirloom ingredients and heritage recipes. They write ancient recipes directly onto the resort menus, creating new opportunities for the chefs, the tourists and the local supply communities.::jimmylittlewood
